meta.title: Muhammad Qasim | Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing product design work and skills

about.bio: I am a passionate MERN stack developer and AI enthusiast focused on building scalable, real-world applications. With a strong foundation in full-stack development, I specialize in integrating AI APIs like OpenAI and Gemini into modern web apps. I thrive on solving complex problems through creative coding, research, and intuitive UI/UX design.
focus: Building full-stack web applications using the MERN stack
Integrating AI APIs for intelligent, real-time user experiences
Exploring and implementing modern frontend technologies like Next.js and Tailwind
Solving real-world problems with creative and scalable tech solutions

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer
experience.description: Responsible for frontend architecture and UI development using React.js and Next.js. Integrated AI APIs for automation features such as content summarization and sentiment analysis.
achievements: Collaborated with product managers and designers to iterate features based on user feedback
Implemented frontend architecture using Next.js for performance optimization
Integrated AI-driven features using OpenAI APIs

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using the MERN stack. Collaborated with the design team to implement user-friendly interfaces and contributed to troubleshooting and code reviews.
achievements: Built and deployed scalable React.js applications
Participated in peer code reviews and bug fixing
Assisted in API integration and backend support

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Worked closely with the design team to develop intuitive UIs. Participated in daily scrums, code reviews, and helped debug production issues.
achievements: Contributed to UI enhancements and mobile responsiveness
Worked on bug resolution and design improvements
Collaborated in a fast-paced agile environment

experience.title: MERN Stack Course (Trainee)
experience.description: Completed a one-year practical course focused on building full-stack applications using the MERN stack. Worked on real-world projects and learned API integration, database management, and frontend-backend workflows.
achievements: Gained hands-on experience in API integration
Developed projects with real-world use cases
